languages.text: "Если говорить о "ничейной" территории, коей является {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}... среди того отребья, который обретается на этой горстке астероидов, есть три фракции, имеющие относительно большое влияние в секторе. Первая — {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссия Касбаллики{/g}. Организованная преступность в самом первозданном виде, имеющая влияние на Наместника Футфола и связи с Вольным Торговцем Винтерскейл. Вторая — ответвление нашей сиятельной Экклезиархии, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}последователи{/g} святого Друза. Активно наращивают силы, пользуясь влиянием на Торговца Чорда. Наконец, третьи — Эксплораторы, крыло {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Готовы умирать и убивать за тайны древней технологической ереси, что скрыта меж звезд Простора Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "Если говорить о "ничейной" территории, коей является Футфол... среди того отребья, который обретается на этой горстке астероидов, есть три фракции, имеющие относительно большое влияние в секторе. Первая — миссия Касбаллика. Организованная преступность в самом первозданном виде, имеющая влияние на Вассала Футфола и связи с Торговцем Винтерскейл. Вторая — ответвление нашей сиятельной Экклезиархии, последователи святого Друза. Активно наращивают силы, пользуясь влиянием на Торговца Чорду. Наконец, третьи — последователи Туле, радикальное крыло Адептус Механикус. Готовы умирать и убивать за тайны Темного Века Технологий, которые скрыты меж звезд Простора".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} is... among the scum that dwells on that handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — organised crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}followers{/g} of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Rogue Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Explorators, a wing of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the ancient technological heresies that are hidden among the stars of the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Если говорить о "ничейной" территории, коей является {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}... среди того отребья, который обретается на этой горстке астероидов, есть три фракции, имеющие относительно большое влияние в секторе. Первая — {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссия Касбаллики{/g}. Организованная преступность в самом первозданном виде, имеющая влияние на Наместника Футфола и связи с Вольным Торговцем Винтерскейл. Вторая — ответвление нашей сиятельной Экклезиархии, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}последователи{/g} святого Друза. Активно наращивают силы, пользуясь влиянием на Торговца Чорда. Наконец, третьи — Эксплораторы, крыло {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Готовы умирать и убивать за тайны древней технологической ереси, что скрыта меж звезд Простора Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what Footfall is... among the scum that dwells in this handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the Kasballica Mission — organized crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, followers of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Disciples of Thule, a radical wing of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the Dark Age of Technology that are hidden among the stars of the Expanse."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what Footfall is... among the scum that dwells in this handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “至于那片‘无主’领土，也就是{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}……那片小行星带所有人渣当中，有三个派系在科罗努斯扩区相当有影响力。第一支势力是{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}，它是一群有组织的犯罪分子组成的犯罪集团，落脚港的总督就是他们的人，而且他们与行商浪人温特斯凯尔有一定联系。第二支势力是{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁斯的追随者{/g}，是我们光辉国教的一支分支教团。他们正在积极建立属于他们自己的力量，在行商浪人库尔达那里很有影响力。最后，也就是第三支势力，是开拓者势力。他们是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的分支，致力于探索科罗努斯扩区，发掘隐藏在各地的古老异形技术。他们愿意为了这些技术献身，也愿意为了它们杀人。”
languages.original_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} is... among the scum that dwells on that handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — organised crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}followers{/g} of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Rogue Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Explorators, a wing of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the ancient technological heresies that are hidden among the stars of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “至于那片‘无主’领土，也就是{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}……那片小行星带所有人渣当中，有三个派系在科罗努斯扩区相当有影响力。第一支势力是{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}，它是一群有组织的犯罪分子组成的犯罪集团，落脚港的总督就是他们的人，而且他们与行商浪人温特斯凯尔有一定联系。第二支势力是{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁斯的追随者{/g}，是我们光辉国教的一支分支教团。他们正在积极建立属于他们自己的力量，在行商浪人库尔达那里很有影响力。最后，也就是第三支势力，是开拓者势力。他们是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的分支，致力于探索科罗努斯扩区，发掘隐藏在各地的古老异形技术。他们愿意为了这些技术献身，也愿意为了它们杀人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what Footfall is... among the scum that dwells on that handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the Kasballica Mission — organised crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, followers of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Rogue Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Explorators, a wing of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the ancient technological heresies that are hidden among the stars of the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: «Si hablamos de territorios "independientes" como el de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}... entre la chusma que habita en ese puñado de asteroides hay tres facciones con considerable influencia en el sector. La primera de ellas es la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Misión Kasballica{/g}: el crimen organizado en su forma más primigenia. Controlan al Señor de Paso y tienen relación con el Comerciante Independiente Winterscale. La segunda facción pertenece a nuestra brillante Eclesiarquía y está compuesta por los {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}seguidores{/g} de san Drusus. Están acumulando fuerzas de forma activa y tienen influencia sobre la Comerciante Independiente Chorda. Por último, el tercero de estos grupos está formado por los exploradores, una rama del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Están dispuestos a morir y matar para hacerse con los secretos de las antiguas herejías tecnológicas ocultas entre las estrellas de la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} is... among the scum that dwells on that handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — organised crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}followers{/g} of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Rogue Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Explorators, a wing of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the ancient technological heresies that are hidden among the stars of the Koronus Expanse."

Controlan al Señor de Paso y tienen relación con el Comerciante Independiente Winterscale. La segunda facción pertenece a nuestra brillante Eclesiarquía y está compuesta por los {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}seguidores{/g} de san Drusus. traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}のような「未開拓」の領土について言うならば…一握りの小惑星に棲むクズどもの中に、このセクターに大きな影響力を持つ3つの勢力があります。1つ目は{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}…最も原始的な形の犯罪組織であり、フットフォールのリージュを支配し、ローグトレーダーのウィンタースケールともつながりがあります。2つ目の勢力は、我らが輝ける帝国聖教会の分派である聖ドゥルスの{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}信徒{/g}です。彼らは積極的に勢力を拡大しており、ローグトレーダー・コーダに影響力を持ちます。そして最後に、第3の勢力である探索艦隊は、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の一翼でもあります。彼らはコロヌス・エクスパンスの星々に隠された古代の技術的異端の秘密のためなら、死も殺しも厭うことはありません」
languages.original_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} is... among the scum that dwells on that handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — organised crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}followers{/g} of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Rogue Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Explorators, a wing of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the ancient technological heresies that are hidden among the stars of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}のような「未開拓」の領土について言うならば…一握りの小惑星に棲むクズどもの中に、このセクターに大きな影響力を持つ3つの勢力があります。1つ目は{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}…最も原始的な形の犯罪組織であり、フットフォールのリージュを支配し、ローグトレーダーのウィンタースケールともつながりがあります。2つ目の勢力は、我らが輝ける帝国聖教会の分派である聖ドゥルスの{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}信徒{/g}です。彼らは積極的に勢力を拡大しており、ローグトレーダー・コーダに影響力を持ちます。そして最後に、第3の勢力である探索艦隊は、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の一翼でもあります。彼らはコロヌス・エクスパンスの星々に隠された古代の技術的異端の秘密のためなら、死も殺しも厭うことはありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn wir von 'unbeanspruchtem' Gebiet sprechen, und genau das ist {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} ... Es gibt unter dem Abschaum, der auf diesen paar Asteroiden lebt, drei Fraktionen, die in dem Sektor beträchtlichen Einfluss genießen. Die erste ist die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} — organisiertes Verbrechen in seiner primitivsten Form, allerdings mit Einfluss auf den Lehnsherren von Footfall und mit Verbindungen zum Freihändler Winterzunder. Die zweite Fraktion ist ein Ableger unserer strahlenden Ekklesiarchie, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Anhänger{/g} des Heiligen Drusus. Sie sind dabei, aktiv ihre Truppen aufzubauen, und besitzen Einfluss auf Freihändlerin Chorda. Und dann die dritte Fraktion, die Exploratoren, ein Flügel des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Sie sind bereit, für die Geheimnisse der uralten technologischen Ketzereien zu sterben und zu töten, die zwischen den Sternen der Koronus-Ausdehnung versteckt sind."
languages.original_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} is... among the scum that dwells on that handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — organised crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}followers{/g} of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Rogue Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Explorators, a wing of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the ancient technological heresies that are hidden among the stars of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn wir von 'unbeanspruchtem' Gebiet sprechen, und genau das ist {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} ... Es gibt unter dem Abschaum, der auf diesen paar Asteroiden lebt, drei Fraktionen, die in dem Sektor beträchtlichen Einfluss genießen. Die erste ist die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} — organisiertes Verbrechen in seiner primitivsten Form, allerdings mit Einfluss auf den Lehnsherren von Footfall und mit Verbindungen zum Freihändler Winterzunder. Die zweite Fraktion ist ein Ableger unserer strahlenden Ekklesiarchie, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Anhänger{/g} des Heiligen Drusus. Sie sind dabei, aktiv ihre Truppen aufzubauen, und besitzen Einfluss auf Freihändlerin Chorda. traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Pour en venir aux territoires "non revendiqués", ce qui est le cas de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}... Parmi la vermine qui occupe cette poignée d'astéroïdes, on distingue trois factions qui jouissent d'une influence considérable dans le secteur. La première est la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g} : le crime organisé sous sa forme la plus primitive. Elle tient le suzerain de Castel sous son emprise et a des liens avec le libre-marchand Winterscale. La deuxième faction est une ramification de notre brillante Ecclésiarchie, les {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}fidèles{/g} de Saint Drusus. Leurs rangs sont en pleine expansion, et ils exercent leur influence sur la libre-marchande Chorda. Enfin, la troisième faction est celle des Explorators, une branche de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Ces gens sont prêts à mourir et à tuer pour mettre la main sur les secrets des hérésies technologiques antiques qui se cachent parmi les étoiles des Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} is... among the scum that dwells on that handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — organised crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}followers{/g} of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Rogue Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Explorators, a wing of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the ancient technological heresies that are hidden among the stars of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "'El değmemiş' topraklar söz konusu olunca, ki {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} da bunlardan biridir... Bu bir avuç asteroitte yaşayan adiler arasında sektörde mühim mertebede güç sahibi sayılabilecek üç fraksiyon mevcuttur. İlki, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu{/g} denilen iptidai bir organize suç örgütüdür. Binliman Emîri'nin bir kulağı bunlardadır, ayrıca Hür Tacir Winterscale ile de bağlantıları vardır. İkinci fraksiyon, Ekleşiarşi'nin soyundan gelen Aziz Drusus {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}müritleridir{/g}. Hâlihazırda saflarını güçlendiren bu fraksiyon, Hür Tacir Chorda üzerinde nüfuz sahibidir. Üçüncü ve son fraksiyon ise {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus'un{/g} bir kanadı olan Keşiftörlerdir. Koronus Enginliği'ndeki yıldızlarda saklı, kadim teknolojik dalaletlerin sırları için ölmeyi ve öldürmeyi göze alırlar."
languages.original_text: "If we are to speak of 'unclaimed' territory, which is what {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} is... among the scum that dwells on that handful of asteroids, there are three factions that wield considerable influence in the sector. The first is the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g} — organised crime in its most primitive form, it holds sway over the Liege of Footfall and has links to Rogue Trader Winterscale. The second faction is an offshoot of our shining Ecclesiarchy, {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}followers{/g} of Saint Drusus. They are actively building their forces, and hold influence over Rogue Trader Chorda. And, finally, the third faction — the Explorators, a wing of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. They are willing to die and kill for the secrets of the ancient technological heresies that are hidden among the stars of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "'El değmemiş' topraklar söz konusu olunca, ki {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} da bunlardan biridir... Bu bir avuç asteroitte yaşayan adiler arasında sektörde mühim mertebede güç sahibi sayılabilecek üç fraksiyon vardır. İlki, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu{/g} denilen iptidai bir organize suç örgütüdür. Binliman Emîri'nin bir kulağı bunlardadır, ayrıca Hür Tacir Winterscale ile de bağlantıları bulunur. İkinci fraksiyon, Ekleşiarşi hazretlerinin soyundan gelen Aziz Drusus {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}müritleri{/g}dir. Hâlihazırda saflarını güçlendiren bu fraksiyon, Hür Tacir Chorda üzerinde nüfuz sahibidir. Üçüncü ve son fraksiyon ise {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'un bir kanadı olan Keşiftörlerdir. Koronus Enginliği'ndeki yıldızlarda saklı kadim teknolojik dalaletlerin sırları için ölmeyi ve öldürmeyi göze alırlar."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
